column1:
optbinning::::.github/workflows/python-package.yml::::jobs::::build::::steps::::steps_2::::run::::python -m pip install --upgrade pip
pip install -r test_requirements.txt
pip install -r requirements.txt

optbinning::::.github/workflows/python-package.yml::::jobs::::build::::steps::::steps_4::::run::::# stop the build if there are Python syntax errors or undefined names
flake8 . --count --select=E9,F63,F7,F82 --show-source --statistics
# exit-zero treats all errors as warnings. The GitHub editor is 127 chars wide
flake8 . --count --exit-zero --max-complexity=10 --max-line-length=127 --statistics
